original_text: And every one that heareth these sayings of mine, and doeth them not, shall be likened unto a foolish man, which built his house upon the sand:
korean_text: 나의 이 말을 듣고 행하지 아니하는 자는 그 집을 모래 위에 지은 어리석은 사람 같으리니

sentences.original_text: And every one that heareth these sayings of mine,
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 나의 이 말씀을 듣는 모든 사람은,

sentences.original_text: shall be likened unto a foolish man,
which built his house upon the sand:
